body:
I (like a lot of other players) am interested in applying for staff but am unable to do it right now.
So I was wondering when it closes so I can see how much time I have.
Thanks.
body_tagged:

title: How long are the staff apps open for?

replies.body: Last time they were up for a few weeks, I suspect that it will be the same this time.
replies.body_tagged: Last time they were up for a few weeks, I suspect that it will be the same this time.

replies.body: Just a question, where do I submit my application? Is it in the "Staff Applications" section?
replies.body_tagged: Just a question, where do I submit my application? Is it in the "Staff Applications" section?

replies.body: Yes. it is, but you will only be able to post your application starting at 12:00pm September 14th EST.
replies.body_tagged: Yes. it is, but you will only be able to post your application starting at 12:00pm September 14th EST.

reply_to.body: Just a question, where do I submit my application? Is it in the "Staff Applications" section?
reply_to.body_tagged: Just a question, where do I submit my application? Is it in the "Staff Applications" section?

replies.body: I think u do it on Skype.
replies.body_tagged: I think u do it on Skype.

replies.body: If your application gets accepted, you will be interviewed on TeamSpeak 3 or on Skype, depending on which option is better for you.
replies.body_tagged: If your application gets accepted, you will be interviewed on TeamSpeak 3 or on Skype, depending on which option is better for you.

reply_to.body: I think u do it on Skype.
reply_to.body_tagged: I think u do it on Skype.

replies.body: You submit your application in the "Staff Applications" sub category, however you can only post it once it has opened.
replies.body_tagged: You submit your application in the "Staff Applications" sub category, however you can only post it once it has opened.

replies.body: Wait one second....when we post it in the staff apps thing, wont others be able to see our apps?!?! D:
replies.body_tagged: Wait one second....when we post it in the staff apps thing, wont others be able to see our apps?!?! D:

reply_to.body: Wait one second....when we post it in the staff apps thing, wont others be able to see our apps?!?! D:
reply_to.body_tagged: Wait one second....when we post it in the staff apps thing, wont others be able to see our apps?!?! D:

replies.body:
All staff applications you send are private and are only viewable by you and the staff.
I know it looks like it is public but it isn't, got me confused at first too xD
replies.body_tagged:
